featuredProp.text2: A peaceful sanctuary nestled away from the city's chaos.
Charming and cozy, surrounded by lush maple trees.
Enjoy golden hour views from every room in this hilltop villa.
Elegant living with timeless oak finishes and modern comforts.
A compact and cozy home perfect for new beginnings.
Luxury living above the skyline with unmatched tranquility.
A coastal gem where ocean breezes and modern elegance meet in perfect harmony.
